title: Old French Part 2
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140830220003im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ger_5862.jpg)

Found are larger and smaller examples of the font I am trying to identify.

thx

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [ger.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140830220003/http:/typophile.com/files/ger.jpg) | 10.59 KB |
author: algerois

comments.content:
It could be **[Bembo (Bold)](http://web.archive.org/web/20140830220003/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Adobe&ffam=Bembo%20-%20Bold&fid=cadf0cf9b13db20ffe8bba8310e037e0&fsize=60&text=GER&fit=1)**  
Second choice: **[ITC Legacy Serif (Medium)](http://web.archive.org/web/20140830220003/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=ITC&ffam=Legacy%20Serif%20ITC%20-%20Medium&fid=dacdb32be31bc97410842b766eb42246&fsize=60&text=GER&fit=1)**
Thank you so much. Both are fine.
